message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with recognizing human actions from still images, which is a task related to computer vision and multimedia. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper proposes a deep learning model to integrate human layout and surrounding contexts for higher level action understanding, which involves training a Deep Belief Net (DBN) to fuse information from different sources. This suggests that the paper could also belong to the categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper deals with multimedia data and its analysis, which could make it relevant to the category of cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper also involves improving the efficiency of the training process, which could make it relevant to the category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
